Module slogo_team01
Package view.mainpane

Interface SelectorPaneObserver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MainVisualiser
    public interface SelectorPaneObserver
    Interface for a Selector Pane observer, that should be updated whenever the selector pane changes state. Part of a simplified observer design pattern.
    Author:
    Goh Khian Wei

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void updateHidePane​(java.lang.String paneName)
      Updates observers whenever a pane is marked as 'hidden' in the selector pane
      void updateShowPane​(java.lang.String paneName)
      Updates observers whenever a pane is marked as 'shown' in the selector pane

    • Method Detail

      • updateHidePane

        void updateHidePane​(java.lang.String paneName)
        Updates observers whenever a pane is marked as 'hidden' in the selector pane
        Parameters:
        paneName - name of pane that has been hidden

      • updateShowPane

        void updateShowPane​(java.lang.String paneName)
        Updates observers whenever a pane is marked as 'shown' in the selector pane
        Parameters:
        paneName - name of pane that has been shown
